SUBINTRO: Use the buttons at the top to access the different charts
PIE-DESCRIPTION: This part of the page will show a pie chart instead
PIE-SUBDESCRIPTION: Try interacting with the different data labels to show or hide information as you will
BAR-DESCRIPTION: This is a bar chart! It will display some useful data that is gathered dynamically through API interaction
BAR-SUBDESCRIPTION: You can select and remove specific data by using the labels at the top
LINE-DESCRIPTION: This component, instead, will show a line chart displaying data for several countries. Try interacting with the labels to show and hide some of them
LINE-SUBDESCRIPTION: Try interacting with the labels to show and hide some of them
